text: usane niyat[1] kiya hai tumhaare lie vahee dharm, jisaka aadesh diya tha nooh ko aur jise vahyee kiya hai aapakee or tatha jisaka aadesh diya tha ibraaheem tatha moosa aur eesa ko ki is dharm kee sthaapana karo aur isamen bhed bhaav na karo. yahee baat apriy lagee hai mushrikon ko, jisakee or aap bula rahe hain. allaah hee chunata hai isake lie jise chaahe aur seedhee raah usee ko dikhaata hai, jo usee kee or dhyaanamagn ho
